com.kaazing.net.ws.amqp

Class AmqpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kaazing.net.ws.amqp.AmqpClient

  • public final class AmqpClient
extends Object
    AmqpClient provides a WebSocket-based Java client API to communicate with any compatible AMQP server that supports AMQP 0.9-1 spec. For more information on AMQP please refer to http://www.amqp.org

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AmqpClient.ReadyState
      Values are CONNECTING = 0, OPEN = 1 and CLOSED = 2;

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AmqpClient(AmqpClientFactory factory)
      Creates a new AmqpClient with default options.

      • connect

        public void connect(String url,
           String virtualHost,
           String username,
           String password)
        Connect to AMQP Broker via Kaazing Gateway
        Parameters:
        url - Location of AMQP Broker or Server
        virtualHost - Name of the virtual host
        username - Username to connect to the AMQP Server
        password - Password to connect to the AMQP Server
